content.p: All new students will attend an induction programme. You will receive more information about your induction near your start date. Most students will also receive an induction from their school where you will received detailed information about your timetable and meet your personal tutor. The International Office also arranges a half-day orientation programme for all international students. This programme is mandatory and will cover important topics such as: The Student Registry Office looks after most administrative matters for our current students. Please visit the Student Registry for more information on: Detailed registration information for current and upcoming intakes can be found in our offer holders section. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8778 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8005
